languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт дарит вам обеспокоенный взгляд.{/n} "Похоже, твоя память ослабла от пагубного влияния контролирующего червя. Суд архонтов вынес ему приговор".
{n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. The Archons' court condemned him."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт дарит вам обеспокоенный взгляд.{/n} "Похоже, твоя память ослабла от пагубного влияния контролирующего червя. Суд архонтов вынес ему приговор".

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは不安そうな顔をする。{/n}「あなたの記憶は、きっと制御ワームの悪影響で弱まっているのよ。アーコンの法廷は彼を断罪したわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. The Archons' court condemned him."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは不安そうな顔をする。{/n}「あなたの記憶は、きっと制御ワームの悪影響で弱まっているのよ。アーコンの法廷は彼を断罪したわ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特关切地看着你。{/n}“你的记忆肯定是受到了蠕虫的干扰，执政官判处他有罪。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. The Archons' court condemned him."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特关切地看着你。{/n}“你的记忆肯定是受到了蠕虫的干扰，执政官判处他有罪。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te mira con preocupación.{/n} «Tu memoria debe haberse debilitado por la influencia del gusano controlador. El tribunal de los Arcontes lo ha condenado».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. The Archons' court condemned him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te mira con preocupación.{/n} «Tu memoria debe haberse debilitado por la influencia del gusano controlador. El tribunal de los Arcontes lo ha condenado».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen besorgten Blick zu.{/n} "Euer Gedächtnis wurde wohl von dem schädlichen Einfluss des Wurms geschwächt. Das Gericht des Archonten hat ihn verurteilt."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. The Archons' court condemned him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen besorgten Blick zu.{/n} "Euer Gedächtnis wurde wohl von dem schädlichen Einfluss des Wurms geschwächt. Das Gericht des Archonten hat ihn verurteilt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard inquiet.{/n} « Votre mémoire a dû être affaiblie par l'influence délétère du ver. Il a été condamné par l'archonte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. The Archons' court condemned him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard inquiet.{/n} « Votre mémoire a dû être affaiblie par l'influence délétère du ver. Il a été condamné par l'archonte. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana endişeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kontrol solucanının zararlı nüfuzu nedeniyle hafızan zayıflamış olmalı. Marazhai, Arkonların mahkemesinde hapse atıldı."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a concerned look.{/n} "Your memory must have been weakened by the deleterious influence of the controlling worm. The Archons' court condemned him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sana endişeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kontrol solucanının zararlı nüfuzu nedeniyle hafızan zayıflamış olmalı. Arkonların mahkemesinde hapse atıldı o."
